name: Meadow Fun!!
description: Meadow Fun!! is a game mainly for kids (from 3 to 10), where players have to gather, with their magic nets, stray animals, along 20 colorful and relaxing levels. All set in a dreamy environment, with a soft and charming original sound track. Gamepad, keyboard and mouse supported. Steam controller supported in game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: intel i5 Memory: 2048 MB RAM Storage: 1500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7 Memory: 8192 MB RAM Storage: 2000 MB available space
